revised_title: Researches on Foraminifera: A Study of Polystomella, Calcarina, Tinoporus, and Carpenteria
tldr: This article examines four distinct types of Foraminifera: Polystomella, Calcarina, Tinoporus, and Carpenteria. The author provides detailed descriptions of their unique structures and discusses their significance in understanding the broader Foraminifera group. The study contributes to the classification and comprehension of these fascinating organisms.
